title: Gamayun 🦉📚
description:
Gamayun is an AI Platform that researches and summarizes any topic for you. 
If it is a url, Gamayun will read it, summarize it and present you with the summary. If it isn't a url, Gamayun will search the web for it, read everything that can be found, summarize it and present to you the summary, the original sources and the original texts
